title: S17 Ep91: The Tuskegee Strangler w/ Linda Lou Long
itunes:title: The Tuskegee Strangler w/ Linda Lou Long
description:
True Crime Tuesday presents The Tuskegee Strangler w/ Author Linda Lou Long!

Jerry Marcus fooled them all. He was “a nice guy,” always helped at home, did well in school, an athlete, and always employed. When things went wrong, he was the first to help clean up the mess. He was the last person anyone suspected of being a serial killer.

After Marcus was caught and sentenced to life in prison in the late ’70s, author Linda Lou Long spent years corresponding with him. TCT invites Linda onto the show to talk about Jerry, his M.O., his case file, and why, to this day, he is still one of the most dngerous men drawing breath. 

Get your copy of "The Tuskegee Strangler: The 'Nicest' Serial Killer They Ever Met" here:
 https://bit.ly/3zpp7TM
